title: Video: Blaenavon – I Will Be The World
content:
Five years ago, we introduced Blaenavon to the world, now they’re ready to take it over.

Having taken their time to piece together their debut LP, produced by the legendary Jim Abbiss, the trio are ready to cement their place as indie-rock gods. I Will Be The World, the first offering from the aforementioned debut record reminds me of when Wolf Alice returned with their heavier sound and more focused direction. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
